static_features: An aging king, displaying fragility in his later years.
dynamic_features: Wearing the heavy, jagged Iron Crown; holding a heavy goblet in a candlelit hall.

static_features: A commanding leader with a fierce demeanor.
dynamic_features: Armored in polished obsidian; visible at the front rank of cavalry formations; later seen wearing a newly forged, simpler silver crown.
Silhouetted against forge fires while studying ancient maps; later standing glowing with dark, unnatural vitality near the Shadow Gate.

static_features: A savage-looking warrior with a scarred face; possesses raw, instinctual power.
dynamic_features: Riding a fierce animal, wielding a massive axe; later battered but unyielding.

static_features: Ancient, malevolent sorcerers whose faces are obscured by darkness.
dynamic_features: Robed figures whose presence crackles with unseen power; associated with sickly green light and the opening of the Shadow Gate.

static_features: Skeletal warriors, impossibly old, composed of bone and rusty metal.
dynamic_features: Rising from corrupted earth, pouring from the Shadow Gate; described as a sickening wave of shambling forms.

static_features: Massive and snarling animals, associated with the Northern warriors.
dynamic_features: Howling fiercely in a frozen forest setting.
